category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_CSV2TCXML_utility_path
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path of the CSV2TCXML utility. This utility is used to convert a CSV file to a TCXML file. This conversion is a part of the process of importing .dat files from IMDS and converting them to the Teamcenter TCXML format.
